title: Please help! 4K Monitor showing small tier 1 turrets, chat and emoticons. Is there a fix?
body: It's about it in the title. I could go 1080p, but the window will be tiny in the middle. I don't want to go fullscreen, as it takes ages to alt+tab between things. Has anyone figured out a solution?

replies.body: I don't believe there's strictly a *solution*, because League just isn't designed to be run in 4K, but player support may have some better workarounds to offer: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
